entry.title: Tuesday night: Chance of light snow. Low minus 35. POP 30%
entry.summary: Partly cloudy with 30 percent chance of light snow. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 35. Wind chill near minus 48. Frostbite in minutes. Forecast issued 10:57 PM CST Tuesday 31 January 2023

entry.title: Wednesday: Chance of light snow. High minus 28. POP 30%
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud with 30 percent chance of light snow. Wind becoming northwest 30 km/h gusting to 50 near noon. High minus 28. Wind chill minus 48 in the morning and minus 43 in the afternoon. Frostbite in minutes. Forecast issued 10:57 PM CST Tuesday 31 January 2023
